name: DesertBusgaea - Overlord of the Bus Place
name_original: DesertBusgaea - Overlord of the Bus Place
description:
Created as a parody of Disgaea, a game I love and with humor flavored by Desert bus for Hope.

Short and sweet RPG. It is not a strategy RPG and you cannot level your weapons etc. 

Made in less than a week by two co-creators as part of the Desert Bus for Hope Game Jam 2018.

This years prompt was: The Drivers Chair!
